articles.title: Lenovo's wild new concept hardware jams AI everywhere, but there's one big problem
articles.author: Cale Hunt
articles.summary: Lenovo has been busy unveiling new AI-powered hardware at MWC 2025. The company has also taken the opportunity to show off a few proof-of-concept (POC) devices that could one day see a full release. Lenovo introduced a new AI Display POC with its own Neural Processing Unit (NPU) inside for handling local AI workflows. Lenovo's AI Now suite of tools was introduced around the same time as Lenovo's ThinkCentre neo Ultra.

articles.title: McDonald's ‘Cheese Dunk' burger goes viral for all the wrong reasons
articles.author: Rebekah Scanlan
articles.summary: The 'Cheese Dunk' is currently only available in the Philippines, but it has caused a stir after a video of it being dunked into a thick, lumpy, orange sauce went viral. Locals are disgusted by the product's appearance and the fact that it comes with a pot of melted cheese.

articles.title: Why I Just Can't Love Linux Mint
articles.author: Dibakar Ghosh
articles.summary: Linux Mint is a stable, reliable and user-friendly Linux distro that provides a smooth transition for Windows users coming to Linux. However, it lacks flexibility and personalization compared to other distros like Fedora, Ubuntu, or Garuda. It's better for new users seeking a Windows-like experience but not for power users desiring customization.

articles.title: Protein drinks muscle up to enter mainstream market
articles.author: Ratna Bhushan
articles.summary: Protein drinks and foods have moved beyond gyms to turn mainstream. 45% of the market is performance protein aimed at regular gym goers, the remaining 55% is lifestyle protein which is seeing the highest growth. Amul's high-protein range has seen 100% growth since launch two years ago.

articles.title: New AI-powered talking sex doll can comfort users who climax too quickly: ‘Two minutes is awesome'
articles.author: Andrew Court
articles.summary: A company has launched a sex doll that has the ability to comfort men if they suffer premature ejaculation. It is made by Chinese company WMDoll and has a new AI feature called MetaBox that allows them to speak. The doll is only sold overseas and won't be launched in China until April this year at the earliest. It can cost upwards of $1900.

articles.title: Flora is building an AI-powered ‘infinite canvas' for creative professionals
articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.summary: Weber Wong is the founder and CEO of Flora, a new startup that uses AI to create creative tools. Flora offers an 'infinite canvas' where users can generate blocks of text, images, and video. The product is available for A16 with limited number of projects and costs $16 per month.

articles.title: For All You People Out There Who Hate Cleaning, Listen Up — These 33 Products Will Make It So Much Easier
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: Drill Brush was started in 2007 by a former electrician with carpal tunnel syndrome. Wet & Forget shower cleaner is the best product I have ever used in my life. Chomomom is a hair remover roller to save pet hair from furniture.

articles.title: The unlikely hack cleaning fans are swearing by to get rid of stains on white socks, and you can give it a try for 17p
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: Lemon juice is a natural bleaching agent that helps brighten fabrics and lift stains. It costs 89p for a pack of five lemons from Sainsbury's. The citric acid in lemons works wonders as a natural bleach and has antibacterial properties.

articles.title: The unlikely hack cleaning fans are swearing by to get rid of stains on white socks, and you can give it a try for 17p
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: Lemon juice is a natural bleaching agent that helps brighten fabrics and lift stains. It costs 89p for a pack of five lemons from Sainsbury's. The citric acid in lemons works wonders as a natural bleach and has antibacterial properties.

articles.title: Beauty buffs 'floored' by results after using 'clinic worthy' anti-ageing gadget for plumper skin
articles.author: Shawna Healey
articles.summary: Trinny London's Microneedling is clinically proven to produce anti-ageing results. The gadget works by using tiny needles to help rejuvenate the skin. One shopper has been using the micro-needle for the last three weeks and see the lines fading.

articles.title: Save More Than $500 On Surface Laptop With Snapdragon X Elite Processor
articles.summary: The deal equates to a saving of $501 off the original price. There is no indication of when this deal will end. The product page lists it as a limited-time deal. The Microsoft Surface Laptop comes with a 13.8-inch screen.

articles.title: Thread: Sexy AI
articles.summary: Elon is demoing GROK in Sexy Mode for Joe Rogan in the opening 5 minutes of this posdcast. He says that within 5 years there could be sex robots with AI like this. Simon43 should have been the Elon of the sex-doll world with his hands on experience and his primitive sex-chat AI prototype software business.

articles.title: Tarifat ndaj Kinës, Apple do të investojë 500 miliardë dollarë në SHBA
articles.author: Gazeta Express
articles.summary: This brand profile is not actively maintained. Products and descriptions have been sourced directly from the brand. The information provided is for informational purposes only and is not guaranteed to be up-to-date or complete. Please check with local retailers for current products in stock.

articles.title: Hapur News: युवती का अपहरण, रिपोर्ट दर्ज
articles.author: गाजियाबाद ब्यूरो
articles.summary: According to the Hindu holy text, the word "vastag" means "to do something" in English. It can also be translated as "to make something". It can mean to do something in English as well as in the language of the person.

articles.title: How To Set Up Amazon Prime Discount Account
articles.summary: Go to the Amazon website or app and create an Amazon account. Click on Subscribe to Prime and follow the instructions. You can sign up for a free trial of Amazon Prime, which includes free two-day shipping on eligible items and access to Amazon Prime Video. After the free trial, you will be charged.

articles.title: Viral �148 leather handbags in 12 colours look just like �25,000 Hermes Kelly
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: "The most gorgeous design and colour. Often mistaken for a famous French brand. I want one in every colour.   “I now want to buy one of them in every color”.  “I want a lot of them.

articles.title: Honor Follows Samsung and Google to Offer 7 Years of Android Updates
articles.author: Katie Collins
articles.summary: Honor will offer seven years of Android updates for its flagship phone series, up from five. It's a commitment that puts Honor in the same software league as Samsung and Google, which are the only two companies to offer this level of support. EU Ecodesign Directive comes into effect this summer and requires phone makers to provide at least five years of OS updates to devices.

articles.title: 36 Treats For Yourself That Are So Practical You Don't Have To Justify Them
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The Olay Super Serum Body Wash is hydrating for dry or dull cold weather skin. Glossmetics' Lychee Overnight Lip Mask is a non-stick, ultra glossy lip shine to help hydrate, soften, and condition lips. The self-heating soothing foot masks are for runners.

articles.title: HONOR Unveils Groundbreaking AI-Powered Earbuds Open at MWC 2025
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: HONOR announced the new corporate strategy to transform HONOR from a smartphone maker to a global leading AI device ecosystem company. The company also introduced the HONor Earbuds Open – an open-ear audio device infused with advanced AI capabilities on stage. The earbuds are ergonomically crafted with a skin-friendly silicone in the design and each earbud weighs 7.9g. The dynamic drivers ensure deep bass and crisp treble, providing an immersive listening experience.

articles.title: Samsung and Google matched by rival's big Android update - will your phone get it?
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Honor is offering seven years of free software updates for its flagship phones starting with the recently released Honor Magic 7 Pro. Samsung and Google offer 7 years of Android updates and, separately, security updates. Samsung Galaxy S25, released in January of this year, will get free updates until 2032.

articles.title: There's a new reason to make the Honor 7 Pro your next phone buy
articles.author: Tom Morgan-Freelander
articles.summary: Honor has committed to seven years of software support for its flagships going forward. The Honor Magic 7 Pro was set to get four major OS upgrades and five years of security patches in January, but now the brand has extended that support to 7 years of each. The longer software commitment was announced at Mobile World Congress as part of Honor's new Alpha Plan corporate strategy.

articles.title: Call of Duty Ramps Up AI Experiments With a Potential New Mobile Game
articles.author: TOI Sports Desk
articles.summary: Activision is promoting Call of Duty: Zombie Defender on Facebook and Instagram. The game is a tactical top-down mobile defense game where players fend off waves of zombies. It features a variety of strategic locations in which to defend from ruined cities to military bases to forests.

articles.title: How AI is Changing Fashion And What It Means For Entrpreneurs
articles.author: Phebe Ejinkeonye-Christian
articles.summary: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is reshaping how things are done in the fashion industry. Nigerian fashion entrepreneurs are ready to tap into this revolution. AI is not just for big brands with million-dollar budgets, but also for small and medium-sized fashion businesses.

articles.title: CTV National News: Apps help consumers choose Canadian goods
articles.summary: As shoppers look to buy Canadian products and avoid U.S. goods, app designers hope to make the search easier. Alex Karpa reports on the app design and its potential to help shoppers find products in Canada and avoid the United States.

articles.title: Human Condition: It's the sparkly gift that keeps on giving all year long — glitter
articles.author: ELIOT KAMENITZ
articles.summary: Henry Ruschmann, a New Jersey rancher and machinist, is credited with accidentally inventing modern glitter in 1934 by using a machine to precisely cut plastic films in thousands of itty-bitty pieces. He started a company called Meadowbrook Inventions to mass-produce the shiny tidbits and is said to be the largest producer of glitter.

articles.title: Beauty lovers love ‘stimulating' body brush that removes dry patches and helps loose skin
articles.author: Shauna Bannon Ward
articles.summary: ESPA Skin Stimulating Body Brush is a go-to for dry brushing fans as it has firm bristles that don't fall out. It's recommended to use it daily to 'boost cell renewal and improve tone for smoother, softer, more radiant skin'. It's made of natural bristles from Mexican cactus plants that help to stimulate circulation and evening skin tone.

articles.title: Pulsar Rok review: a stylish, versatile, and affordable weed device
articles.author: Greenstate Staff
articles.summary: Pulsar Rok is a state-of-the-art electronic dab rig from a famous brand. It's a combination of a dab rig and a vaporizer. Pulsar is an industry-leading brand that produces some of the highest quality vaping and smoking accessories.

articles.title: 7 Best Lip Primers to Lock in Your Lip Color
articles.author: Christa Joanna Lee
articles.summary: The best lip primers keep your lipstick fresh and locked in all day. Anastasia Beverly Hills Clear Lip Primer is a colorless, lightweight balm that gives your lipstick grip. Sarah Creal's Lip Griping Treatment is designed to soften, smooth and soften the grip onto lip color without drying it.

articles.title: OnePlus 13 is the most complete flagship yet: REVIEW
articles.author: International Business Times
articles.summary: OnePlus is back at it again, refining its flagship formula with the OnePlus 13. This time, it's not just about raw power but a more mature and refined experience. It's a phone that ditches the gimmicks in favor of real, everyday usability.

articles.title: Purgatory on the shop floor
articles.summary: Fitch O'Connell is shocked to see a new self-service checkout system installed in his local supermarket. He had a bad experience with a similar system in Porto when he bought a bottle of red wine and the machine didn't work properly. He is not happy with the new system.

articles.title: 2025 Toyota LandCruiser Prado Altitude review
articles.author: Jack Quick
articles.summary: The new Prado lives up to expectations. It tows well and has a range of different options for buyers to choose from. The overall experience is more of an evolutionary change than a revolutionary one, but it might be revolutionary in some ways.

articles.title: Boots No7 cream that 'leaves skin so soft' on sale for 24 hours only
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: No7 Restore & Renew Face & Neck Multi Action Night Cream is on sale at Boots for £23.06 this Sunday, March 2, saving almost £10. The Super Sunday initiative started today (March 2) and is set to return on the first Sunday of each month.

articles.title: Amazon is selling a $90 waterproof Bluetooth speaker for only $25, and shoppers say it's ‘small yet powerful'
articles.author: Emma Kershaw
articles.summary: Zicoroop Portable Bluetooth Speaker is on sale at Amazon for $25. It's a 72% discount from the original price of $90. It has an extended wireless range of up to 66 feet and enhanced connectivity. The TWS function allows two Bluetooth speakers to be used simultaneously.

articles.title: The AI Revolution In Business: Insights From Kellogg Professor Sawhney
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Generative AI is revolutionizing industries, transforming digital marketing, business operations, and customer engagement. Let's get ready for this Ai-driven wave.   .     Â   in this article. For more information, visit Generative AI's website.

articles.title: Safety-first smartphone for children unveiled
articles.author: Martyn Landi
articles.summary: Fusion X1 smartphone has built-in parental controls and location tracking to keep children safe. It was created by phone maker HMD in response to new research that found that more than half of children had been contacted online by strangers. HMD is the company behind modern Nokia devices.

articles.title: Amazon knocks £25 off 'fantastic' earbuds with 'insane' noise cancelling abilities
articles.author: Eilidh Farquhar
articles.summary: The Liberty 4 NC Earbuds have a noise-cancelling technology that reduces background noise up to 98.5%. They have 10,000 five-star reviews and over 500 people have used them in the past month. The earbuds are IPX4 water-resistance and have six mics.

articles.title: Amazon just gave Alexa its biggest upgrade since debut - and you'll want an Echo Show for it
articles.author: Kerry Wan
articles.summary: Alexa is at the core of Amazon's most prominent hardware products, including Echo speakers and Fire TVs. Today, the company showcased what's next for its virtual assistant, now named Alexa+, as it looks to compete with the likes of Google, OpenAI, and others.

articles.title: China's Yiwu merchants leverage AI innovations including DeepSeek to help reshape e-commerce
articles.author: Ding Yazhi
articles.summary: In Yiwu city, merchants are at the forefront of an AI-driven business model innovation that is powered by DeepSeek. Sun Lijuan's business has flourished thanks to AI-generated multilingual videos that serve as a powerful marketing tool. Fu Jiangyan, a 20-year veteran engaging in sock business, has used the latest AI technology to grow her business.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Release Date Pushed Back: What You Need to Know About the Delay
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Anya Sharma is a senior analyst at Gaming Insights Group. She predicts a June launch for the Nintendo Switch 2. She expects the launch price to be competitive, the launch lineup of games to be compelling and the new features to be appealing. She also hopes for a clear picture of the launch titles.

articles.title: Aldi's 9L air fryer hits shelves TODAY and it's a whopping 67% cheaper than Ninja alternative
articles.author: Milad Sherzad
articles.summary: Aldi's Ambiano Dual Zone Air Fryer is on sale for just £59.99 from today. It's 67% cheaper than the Ninja Foodi MAX Dual Zone and is half a litre smaller in capacity. Aldi's other Specialbuys are a 14 inch Stir Fry Wok for £8.99 and a Multi-Function Chopper for £7.99.

articles.title: Samsung unveils new $300 AI-powered 5G Galaxy models
articles.summary: Samsung announced the launch of its new AI-powered phone lineup. The first addition, the Galaxy A26, will be sold for approximately $299.99. The Galaxy A56 will start at $499.99, offering significant photo enhancements and optimized group photo capabilities. Samsung unveiled its new smartphones shortly after Apple released its iPhone 16e, priced at approximately $599.

articles.title: 'Don't Google it, Just Grok it': Elon Musk endorses Grok AI chatbot by X
articles.author: TOI World Desk
articles.summary: Elon Musk, the CEO of X and founder of xAI, endorsed his AI chatbot Grok in a post on X on Sunday (IST). The move comes amid growing competition between Grok and Google's AI-driven services, particularly in the fields of language models and search capabilities. Grok 3 is being rolled out to Premium Plus subscribers on X. Musk also announced a new subscription plan, which will offer advanced capabilities and early access to new features.

articles.title: Huge 9L air fryer reduced from £248 to £48 that's 'a brilliant Ninja alternative'
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Air fryers can be cheaper to run than conventional ovens and cook food more quickly. They can be a healthier way of cooking with far less, if not zero oil. They are dishwasher safe and have two separate drawers for cooking. However, after only 8 months of light use, one customer's air fryer stopped working.

articles.title: Clean up with massive savings on this Dyson and Shark alternative
articles.author: Chris Hall
articles.summary: The Hoover HF9 is a cordless stick vacuum cleaner with anti-wrap technology and two batteries for double cleaning time. It's twice as powerful as Shark's best-selling cordless vacuum cleaner. Hoover has a range of discounts at the moment, boosted by codes that will slash another £100 off the price.

articles.title: Fayetteville City Council to vote on renter protection ordinance at Tuesday's meeting

articles.summary: A new ordinance proposed to replace an existing one was presented in Fayetteville on Tuesday. It would provide renters with additional consumer protections. It is proposed to protect renters' rights and property rights of tenants.      Â   in the new ordinance.

articles.author: CHRISTIAN WARDLAW Edmunds
articles.summary: Edmunds' editors highlight what they think will be the most interesting vehicles for car shoppers coming out later this year. They range from a retro-themed performance sedan with a traditional gasoline engine to a rugged off-road SUV powered by electricity. There's even a pickup truck that offers a gas engine and electric propulsion simultaneously.

articles.title: Róisín Ingle puts a Thermomix to the test: ‘I am a convert but there's one enormous catch'

articles.summary: The Thermomix costs €1,500 and is the world's most powerful blender. It can steam, sauté, chop, mix, mince, grind, knead, weigh, slow cook, emulsify, stir, ferment, whip and even sous vide. The Cookidoo app has more than 50,000 recipes. Róis is the main meal provider in his house.

articles.title: 'Super cute' M&S backpack shoppers say is 'perfect' for kids
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: M&S is selling a Paddington-themed backpack for £14. Shoppers are praising it for its quality, practical shape and adorable design. The bag is machine washable at 40°C and can be tumble dried on medium setting, but it should not be bleached or ironed.

articles.author: Phoebe Barton
articles.summary: Ultenic U10 Ultra Cordless Vacuum Cleaner costs £84.98 (RRP £99.99). The cordless gadget is designed to effortlessly tackle dust and dirt. It has a battery life of 40 minutes and can be reduced to 18 minutes for extra suction. Amazon is offering a 29% discount on the product.

articles.title: Best Mattress to Buy on Amazon in 2025
articles.author: McKenzie Dillon
articles.summary: Amazon has a wide variety of mattresses from popular brands and prices are hard to beat. Nectar Premier Hybrid is the best overall mattress on Amazon. Lucid 10-inch memory foam mattress is $349 at Amazon. Tuft and Needle Nod Hybrid is $999 at Amazon and Awara Premier is $1,329.

articles.summary: To stream WeAreIowa on your phone, you need the We are Iowa app.       iweareiabook.com.  Iweareibooks.com is a free app for Android and iOS users. It's available in English and Spanish.

articles.author: Business Day
articles.summary: Germany has unveiled the eligibility criteria for its newly introduced German Opportunity Card (Chancenkarte). The card is a visa program designed to attract skilled workers and it is available to all citizens. Click here to read the full news article.

articles.title: Mozilla Revises Firefox's Terms of Use, Clarifies That They Don't Own Your Data
articles.author: Slashdot
articles.summary: Mozilla revises its Terms of Use to reflect the limited scope of how it interacts with user data. Mozilla collects and shares some data with its partners so that Firefox can be "commercially viable" and works to strip data of potentially identifying information or share in aggregate.

articles.summary: The company's latest affordable smartphones are thinner and more durable and have a sprinkling of AI. They are available in black and white and are priced between $300 and $600.   .   i.e. Black and white are cheaper than the previous models.

articles.summary: This is part of Mamamia's Erotic Fiction Series, brought to you by Butter. Her girlfriend is at a conference. She wants to have sex with him in the hotel room. She gives him instructions on how to do it. She also gives him a vibrator.

articles.title: Do not just do it
articles.author: Tim Middleton
articles.summary: Manufacturers of sports equipment have their mottos. Puma came up with 'Forever faster', Reebok went with 'I Am What I Am', Adidas joined in with 'Impossible is Nothing' and Nike famously went for 'Just Do It'. It may be an unwise choice of slogan as children do not react well to being told just to do something. Children need to learn Critical Thinking, to ask questions, to find reasons and to work things out for themselves.

articles.author: By:

It's the first-ever tri-folding smartphone with three screen sizes: 10.2, 7.9 and 6.4 inches. Inquirer Tech tested the device during its February 28, 2025 launch event and found that its hinge is sturdier than others.

The platform follows strict data privacy protocols and protects user data with secure encryption and private storage. It works on desktops and mobile devices.

articles.title: 'Genius' hack to remove sticky price tags that uses just one household staple

articles.summary: Liz Richards has shared a life hack for getting the annoying sticky labels off new products. She burns a Sellotape over the top of the label and then pulls the tape off at one side to remove it easily. Some people recommend using a hair dryer or a blow dryer to remove stickers.

articles.summary: More than one-third of U.S. consumers aren't loyal to traditional brands anymore. They prefer companies that challenge norms, disrupt systems and make bold, unapologetic stands. articles.title: The unlikely hack cleaning fans are swearing by to get rid of stains on white ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: There's no better feeling than slipping on a fresh, white pair of socks. White socks often show up stains even after you have washed them. Lemon juice can't do anything that lemon juice can, and better, according to the author.   .
